AT.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
AT.description: Hinweis: Wenn du bereits ein Exemplar von „Animal Crossing: New Leaf“ besitzt, kannst du mithilfe des im eShop verfügbaren Downloads ein kostenloses Update auf „Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo“ durchführen. Bei Animal Crossing: New Leaf erwartet dich ein aufregendes, neues Leben! Hast du schon mal von einem neuen Zuhause, einem neuen Job und einem neuen Leben geträumt? Genau das erwartet dich jetzt bei Animal Crossing New Leaf! Ziehe in eine neue Stadt und werde dort zum Bürgermeister. Anschließend bestimmst du, in welchem Tempo du dein Leben führst. Finde neue Freunde, mache alle möglichen Erfahrungen und erschaffe dir die Stadt deiner Träume! Unterstützt 4 Spieler online und 4 Spieler im lokalen Spiel. Unter amiibo.nintendo.eu findest du eine Liste kompatibler amiibo™ und aktuelle Informationen. Um amiibo auf Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- und Nintendo 2DS-Systemen zu benutzen, wird ein Nintendo 3DS-NFC-Lese-/Schreibgerät benötigt.

movies.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo: Trailer
AC:NL - Welcome amiibo: Nepp und Schlepp

AU.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
AU.description: Please note: If you already own "Animal Crossing: New Leaf", you can update your game to "Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo" with the free update downloadable via eShop. An exciting new life awaits you in Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Have you ever wanted a new home, a new job, a new life? There's one waiting for you in Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Move to a new town and become mayor, then live life at your own pace; make new friends, have all kinds of experiences and create the town of your dreams! Supports 4 Players online and 4 Players via Local Play. Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

movies.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo: Trailer

BE.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
BE.description: Note : si vous possédez déjà le jeu « Animal Crossing: New Leaf », vous pouvez obtenir « Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo » grâce à la mise à jour gratuite téléchargeable sur le Nintendo eShop. Une nouvelle vie exaltante vous attend dans Animal Crossing: New Leaf ! Vous avez toujours voulu changer de maison, de boulot, de vie ? Voici tout ce qui vous attend dans Animal Crossing: New Leaf ! Emménagez dans une nouvelle ville et devenez-en le maire, puis vivez à votre rythme. Rencontrez de nouveaux amis, faites de nouvelles expériences et créez la ville de vos rêves ! Supporte 4 joueurs en ligne et 4 joueurs en mode multijoueur local. Visitez le site amiibo.nintendo.eu pour voir la liste des amiibo™ compatibles et en savoir plus. Un lecteur/enregistreur NFC est nécessaire pour utiliser les amiibo avec les consoles Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL et Nintendo 2DS.

movies.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo: Trailer

ES.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
ES.description: Nota: Si ya tienes el juego “Animal Crossing: New Leaf”, puedes obtener “Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo” gracias a la actualización gratuita que puedes descargar a través de Nintendo eShop. ¡Empieza una nueva vida en Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Seguro que alguna vez has pensado en cambiar de casa o de trabajo, ¡incluso de vida! ¡Pues en Animal Crossing: New Leaf, puedes hacer las tres cosas! Te mudas a un pueblo nuevo, te conviertes en el alcalde y vives exactamente como quieres, haciendo nuevos amigos y viviendo nuevas experiencias a la vez que das forma al pueblo hasta convertirlo en el lugar en el que todos querríamos vivir. Soporta 4 jugadores en línea y 4 jugadores en modo de juego local. Visita amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar la lista de amiibo™ compatibles y la información más reciente. Para poder usar amiibo en las consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL y Nintendo 2DS, es necesario disponer de un lector/grabador de NFC para Nintendo 3DS.

IT.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
IT.description: Nota: se possiedi già il gioco "Animal Crossing: New Leaf", puoi scaricare "Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo" tramite l'aggiornamento gratuito che trovi nel Nintendo eShop. Una nuova vita entusiasmante ti aspetta in Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Hai mai pensato di cambiare casa, cambiare lavoro, cambiare vita? Adesso potrai farlo in Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Trasferisciti in una nuova città a fare il sindaco e poi vivi la tua vita secondo le tue esigenze personali: conosci nuovi amici, fai le esperienze che preferisci e crea la città dei tuoi sogni! Supporta 4 giocatori online e 4 giocatori tramite modalità wireless. Consulta il sito amiibo.nintendo.eu per maggiori dettagli sugli amiibo™ compatibili e informazioni aggiornate. Per usare gli amiibo con la console Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS è necessario un lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS.

movies.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo: Trailer

NL.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
NL.description: Opmerking: als je 'Animal Crossing: New Leaf' al hebt, kun je je game updaten naar 'Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo' met de gratis update, die je kunt downloaden in de Nintendo eShop. Er wacht je een spannend nieuw leven in Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Hunker je ooit naar een nieuw huis, een nieuwe baan en een nieuw leven? Hier kun je namelijk naar uitkijken in Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Verhuis naar een stadje, word burgemeester en leef je leven op je eigen tempo; maak nieuwe vrienden, beleef nieuwe dingen en creëer de leefomgeving van je dromen! Ondersteunt 4 spelers online en 4 spelers via Local Play. Kijk op amiibo.nintendo.eu voor compatibele amiibo™ en de meest recente informatie. Om amiibo te gebruiken op Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- en/of Nintendo 2DS-systemen is een NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS nodig.

movies.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo: Trailer

NZ.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
NZ.description: Please note: If you already own "Animal Crossing: New Leaf", you can update your game to "Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo" with the free update downloadable via eShop. Move to a new town and become mayor, then live life at your own pace; make new friends, have all kinds of experiences and create the town of your dreams! Supports 4 Players online and 4 Players via Local Play. Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. movies.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo: Trailer

PT.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
PT.description: Atenção: Se já possuis o título "Animal Crossing: New Leaf", podes atualizar o teu jogo para "Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo" com a atualização grátis que poderás descarregar através da Nintendo eShop. Visita o site oficial de Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Sempre quiseste uma nova casa, um novo emprego, uma nova vida? Tudo isto está à tua espera no novo Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Muda-te para uma nova cidade e torna-te presidente da Câmara; depois vive a vida ao teu próprio ritmo, fazendo novos amigos e passando por todo o tipo de experiências enquanto crias a cidade dos teus sonhos! Suporta 4 jogadores online e 4 jogadores através do modo de jogo local. Aceda a amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar a lista de amiibo™ compatíveis e as informações mais recentes. Para usar os amiibo com as Consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS, é necessário um leitor/gravador de NFC Nintendo 3DS.

movies.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo: Trailer

RU.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Примечание. Если у вас уже есть игра Animal Crossing: New Leaf, вы можете получить версию Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo, загрузив бесплатное обновление в Nintendo eShop. Новая увлекательная жизнь ожидает вас в Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Вам когда-нибудь хотелось сменить дом, работу, всю жизнь? Все это ждет вас в Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Станьте мэром своего города и живите, как вам захочется: заводите новых друзей, пробуйте новые занятия и создавайте город вашей мечты! Поддерживает игру онлайн для 4 игроков и локальную игру для 4 игроков. Посетите amiibo.nintendo.eu для получения информации о совместимых amiibo™ и прочей актуальной информации. Чтобы использовать amiibo с системами Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL или Nintendo 2DS, необходимо устройство чтения/записи NFC для Nintendo 3DS.

movies.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo: трейлер

SE.name: Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo
SE.description: Please note: If you already own "Animal Crossing: New Leaf", you can update your game to "Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo" with the free update downloadable via eShop. An exciting new life awaits you in Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Have you ever wanted a new home, a new job, a new life? There's one waiting for you in Animal Crossing: New Leaf! Move to a new town and become mayor, then live life at your own pace; make new friends, have all kinds of experiences and create the town of your dreams! Supports 4 Players online and 4 Players via Local Play. Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.
